description: Grade 9 / Junior High Year 3 (Suzhou High School Entrance Exam Standard)

topics: Man & Self (Life habits, Mental health, Personal feelings)
Man & Society (Traditional Culture, Volunteering, School life)
vocabulary.level_description: Mastery of 1600-2000 core vocabulary words; focus on high-frequency verbs and transitional phrases.

grammar: It is + adj. + for sb. + to do sth.
Modal Verbs (should/must/can for advice and obligation)

writing_standards.complexity: Use a mix of simple, compound, and complex sentences. Include at least 2-3 complex sentence structures.
writing_standards.structure: Three-paragraph structure: 1. Topic Sentence (Introduction) -> 2. Supporting Details (Body) -> 3. Summary/Opinion (Conclusion).
writing_standards.cohesion: Effective use of transition words (e.g., Firstly, Besides, However, In my opinion, All in all).

correction_focus: Proper use of conjunctions (avoiding run-on sentences like 'I like it, it is good')
Handwriting and neatness (Critical for exam scoring)
